roleset.name: steadfast

example.name: both args
example.text: People in the mainland are unswerving in their determination and aspiration to acknowledge the " 1992 Consensus , " abandon " Taiwan Independence " and realize the peaceful reunification of the two sides across the Taiwan Straits .
example.arg: their determination and aspiration to acknowledge the " 1992 Consensus , " abandon " Taiwan Independence " and realize the peaceful reunification of the two sides across the Taiwan Straits

roleset.note: UNSWERVING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from unswerving.01-j)
